item.title: Kubernetes Home Lab with K3S and Raspberry Pi 4
About Us
item.description: And God said, “Let there be light,” I am not a firm believer of god but I always want to use this quote, especially when I work on something related to Linux or computers in general. Using Linux is in fact like being a god, a god who mounts disks, a god who send its petty users to /dev/null and a god who sees and who deletes.
